title: Manase Manase Lyrics April Maadhathil
stanzas:
manase manase
manasil baaram
nanbar koottam
piriyum neram (2)

indha boomiyil ulla
sondhangal ellaam
yaedhedho edhirpaarkume

indha kalloori sondham
idhu mattumthaane
natpinai edhirpaarkume

manase manase
manasil baaram
nanbar koottam
piriyum neram

netraikku kanda kanavugal
indraikku unnum unavugal
ondraaga ellorum parimaarinom

veettukkul thondrum sogamum
natpukkul marandhu pogirom
nagaichuvai kurumpodu
nadamaadinom

natpu endra vaarthaikkul
naamum vazhnthu
paarthome

iththanai inimaigal
irukkindrathaa
pirivu endra vaarthaikkul
naamum sendru vazhthaan
valimai irukindrathaa

manase manase
manasil baaram
nanbar koottam
piriyum neram

aaraezhu aandu ponadhum
angangae vazhntha podhilum
pugaipadam adhil nanban
mugam thaeduvom

engeyo paartha niyaabagam
endrethaan sollum naal varum
kuralile adaiyaalam
naam kaanuvom.

chinna chinna sandaigal
chinna chinna leelaigal
indrudam ellaame
mudikinrathe

sollavantha kadhalgal
sollivitta kadhalgal
sumaigalin sumaiyaanathe

manase manase
manasil baaram
nanbar koottam
piriyum neram

manase manase
manasil baaram
nanbar koottam
piriyum neram (2)

indha boomiyil ulla
sondhangal ellaam
yaedhedho edhirpaarkume

indha kalloori sondham
idhu mattumthaane
natpinai edhirpaarkume

seo.title: Manase Manase Lyrics April Maadhathil
seo.description: Get the complete Manase Manase Lyrics April Maadhathil from April Mathathil. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Yuvan and sung by Karthik. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pa Vijay, April Mathathil, Yuvan, Karthik, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
